items.name: From Pilot to Practice: How BBVA Is Scaling AI Across the Organization
items.summary: BBVA is reimagining how employees work with ChatGPT Enterprise, embedding AI into everyday operations. The bank has saved hours per week per employee, created 20,000+ Custom GPTs, and achieved up to 80% efficiency gains.

items.summary: OpenAI is expanding Stargate to Michigan with a new one-gigawatt campus that strengthens America’s AI infrastructure. The project will create jobs, drive investment, and support economic growth across the Midwest.
